allIssues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
allIssues.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.25:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0052a5, surrounding text: #1b1b1b)\n  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
allIssues.testPageTitle: Usługi dla obywatela - Gov.pl - Portal Gov.pl
